name: Lauren'Z Inky Adventure (Visual novel)
description:
This is a fangame for a YouTuber called LaurenZSide.  If you're a fan of her, or maybe Lauren herself feel free to try it out!

It took me 7 months and I restarted it from scratch after 2 months with a completly new concept. Originally it was supposed to be about an obsessed fan. I have even already worked out the entire plot in my mind. Who knows, maybe one day I'll make it.

THE GAME CONTAINS SOME CONTENT THAT DOESN'T BELONG TO ME!
A detailed list of all these content can be found at the very end of the game!
